/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in a palette of red, white, and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and enhancing the colors of the buildings. In the distance, trees can be seen lining the street, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape.
